short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This externsion is made for clients at Desocloud to login directly from the extenstion to User Panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is made for clients at Desocloud to login directly from the extension which presents a UI with login and lost password in which user can login or resent password. After login has been confirmed the extension will prompt you to the Client panel. If you are a customer at Deso Cloud you can use this extension to login directly without any problem. If you have any questions please contact us.
